original_text:
Though you soar like the eagle
    and make your nest among the stars,
    from there I will bring you down,”
declares the Lord.
korean_text: 네가 독수리처럼 높이 오르며 별 사이에 깃들일지라도 내가 거기에서 너를 끌어내리리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Though you soar like the eagle
and make your nest among the stars
from there I will bring you down
